price: Furtuuwwan rahmata Rabbii keetii kan injifataa, arjoomaa ta’ee isaan bira jiraa?
arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡوَهَّابِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am ʿindahum khazāinu raḥmati rabbika al-ʿazīzi al-wahābi
